summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Phase 2 advanced grid features including Liquidity Ladder mode, confirmation dialogs, enhanced price display, throttled recalculation, and auto-recalc toggle functionality

ui_bugs.issue: Block clicking sometimes fails due to DOM element detachment during grid regeneration
LIQ mode indicator occasionally not immediately visible after mode switch

passed_tests: LIQUIDITY_LADDER mode generates impact-price grid successfully
Mode indicator shows 'LIQ' when Liquidity Ladder mode is active
Price blocks display delta (â‚¹X.XX) with directional arrows correctly
Price blocks show percentage change (+/-X.XX%) accurately
Auto-recalc toggle in settings works and can be toggled on/off
Manual recalc button in toolbar functions properly
Grid remains stable during price movement with throttled recalculation
No duplicate price blocks found in grid
Confirmation dialog structure exists with proper buttons
Settings panel allows switching between grid modes
Throttled recalculation limits grid changes to ~5 times per second

action_item_for_main_agent.block_interaction_stability: Improve block click handling during grid regeneration - consider debouncing clicks or using more stable selectors
action_item_for_main_agent.dialog_testing: Complete testing of confirmation dialog actions (Yes, Cancel / Yes, Square Off) requires executed block state which needs market simulation
action_item_for_main_agent.armed_state_preservation: Verify armed state preservation during grid regeneration requires longer simulation runtime
